TEXT.TITLE: SIX KILLED IN SOUTH AFRICAN MINE
TEXT.BODY: Six workers were killed and four injured in an undeground rock fall at South Africa's second largest gold mine today, the mine owners said. It was the third major mine accident in the country in less than a week. Thirty four workers died in methane gas explosion at a coal mine last Thursday. Reuter
